About NFC Tool

My main focus right now is NFC Tool, a privacy-focused mobile application for reading and interacting with NFC-enabled devices. The app prioritizes user privacy with:

  • Local-only processing - No data leaves your device
  • No internet permissions - Complete offline operation
  • Secure protocols - Industry-standard encryption for sensitive data
  • Transparent privacy practices - Open about what data is processed
